name: Wildlife Park 2 - Fantasy
description: It becomes fantastic! Real mythical creatures will become the main attraction in your zoo for the very first time. White and black unicorns, saphire- and firedragons will asthonish your park visitors.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10/8/7 Processor: Intel Pentium IV 2 GHz or compatible Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9c compatible, 64 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3000 MB available space Additional Notes: ATTENTION: Does not work with any Wildlife Park Retail Versions

reviews.review_text: after a few hours my park took a turn for the worse so i decided to buy two dragons to mate. as soon as i bought them i realised the unicorn enclosure wasnt strong enough and they escaped and ate all the workers... so i was 3mil in debt with two dragons on the loose.

I agree with most of the people in the comments this game should be labled as a DLC because with no tutorials or any guident the game is nearly impossable to play.  By looking at my account it looks like I have spent a while on this game in all truth I have only played it for 20 minuits. :P
It is pretty good. Ron Paul for Jesus
It's like Sim City or the Tycoon games-except worse. Please do not buy any of the Wildlife Park games.
